"It CAN'T BEE!!!!"Snarled Hydras while he took off the 
microphone "I'M MEGATRON AND GALVATRON IN ONE!!!!! HOW COULD BE 
THAT?????... MAXIMA!!!!! Took this helmet and use it... as well as 
thjis gloves and microphone... you will control electronic-puppet ad 
you will pretend to be me to deceive Lord Vykos other pred leader... 
Find out my dear what doeas he pretends... WHIL I CRUSH THAT FALSE 
BOT THAT PRETEND TO BE ME!!! "
